column2: The U.S. stock market should be given the benefit of the doubt over the next 12 months, according to an analysis of short sellers’ recent transactions. This upbeat message may incline you to view short sellers more positively. For this column, I’m not interested in short-sellers’ integrity and virtue (or lack thereof).
column4: Short-sellers are scarce and that’s some of the best news the stock market’s had lately
